net.metro.analyze

Class DataControlPalette

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JInternalFrame
            • net.metro.analyze.DataControlPalette
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class DataControlPalette
extends javax.swing.JInternalFrame
    This internal frame is the controller for all data visualizations on the map. It allows the user to specify the constraints as to which routes, route paths, days, time periods, data types, and scale to be shown on the SystemMap.
    Author:
    Sean Harger
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void addRoutePath()
      Shows an AddRoutePath dialog requesting that the user specify a RoutePath to add to the constraint list.
      private void attemptToCommitScaleValues()
      Attempts to set the specified minimum and maximum scale values to the SystemMap.
      private void constructLabelTable()
      Constructs a Hashtable for the time period slider and associates static integers with selectable time periods.
      void dispose()
      Disposes frame and de-selects the "Show Data Control Palette" option in the MapFrame.
      private java.util.ArrayList<RoutePath> getRoutePathsInList()
      Returns each RoutePath added to the constraint list.
      private DataType getSelectedDataType()
      Returns the selected data type in the combo box.
      private Day[] getSelectedDays()
      Returns an array of the selected Day objects from the radio buttons.
      private Period getSelectedPeriod()
      Interprets the selected radio buttons and slider position into a Period object
      private TimePeriod getSelectedTimePeriod()
      Returns the selected TimePeriod from the slider.
      protected boolean isRoutePathInList(RoutePath rtePth)
      Returns whether a RoutePath is in the constraint list.
      private void registerListeners()
      Initializes the EventListeners for the GUI elements.
      private void removeSelectedRoutePath()
      Removes the selected RoutePath from the constraint list.
      private void setInitialValues()
      Sets the initial values for the period, day, and time period constraints according to the initial constraints specified in the MapFrame.
      private void setLocationBottomRight()
      Sets the location of this DataControlPalette to the bottom right hand corner of the MapFrame.
      private void setUpGui()
      Initializes the GUI for this DataControlPalette.
      private void updateDataSelection()
      Updates the selected DataType in the SystemMap according to the value specified in the combobox_DataType
      private void updatePeriodConstraint()
      Updates the Period constraint as specified according to the selection of day radio buttons and the position of the time period slider.
      private void updateRoutePathConstraint()
      Updates the RoutePath constraint in the MapFrame according to the selected RoutePaths in the list.

                  SystemMap mp)
        Constructs a DataControlPalette internal frame.
        Parameters:
        mpFrm - reference to MapFrame from which the DataControlPalette was invoked.
        mp - reference to SystemMap which the DataControlPalette is intended to control.

      • isRoutePathInList

        protected boolean isRoutePathInList(RoutePath rtePth)
        Returns whether a RoutePath is in the constraint list.
        Parameters:
        rtePth - RoutePath to look for in the list.
        Returns:
        true if the RoutePath is in the list.

      • getRoutePathsInList

        private java.util.ArrayList<RoutePath> getRoutePathsInList()
        Returns each RoutePath added to the constraint list.
        Returns:
        list of RoutePaths added to the constraint list.

      • updateRoutePathConstraint

        private void updateRoutePathConstraint()
        Updates the RoutePath constraint in the MapFrame according to the selected RoutePaths in the list. Also selects those same RoutePaths in the SystemMap in case the selected RoutePaths do not have data. In this way, they are still shown as selected on the map but are in a different color indicating that they do not have data.

      • updatePeriodConstraint

        private void updatePeriodConstraint()
        Updates the Period constraint as specified according to the selection of day radio buttons and the position of the time period slider.

      • getSelectedPeriod

        private Period getSelectedPeriod()
        Interprets the selected radio buttons and slider position into a Period object
        Returns:
        Period object representing the currently selected day/time period values.

      • getSelectedDataType

        private DataType getSelectedDataType()
        Returns the selected data type in the combo box.
        Returns:
        the selected data type in the combo box.

      • updateDataSelection

        private void updateDataSelection()
        Updates the selected DataType in the SystemMap according to the value specified in the combobox_DataType

      • attemptToCommitScaleValues

        private void attemptToCommitScaleValues()
        Attempts to set the specified minimum and maximum scale values to the SystemMap. Displays an error message if the minimum value is greater than the maximum value or if the typed integer value is not formatted properly.

      • getSelectedDays

        private Day[] getSelectedDays()
        Returns an array of the selected Day objects from the radio buttons.
        Returns:
        an array of the selected Day objects from the radio buttons.

      • getSelectedTimePeriod

        private TimePeriod getSelectedTimePeriod()
        Returns the selected TimePeriod from the slider.
        Returns:
        the selected TimePeriod from the slider.

        Initializes the GUI for this DataControlPalette.
